Column Comment.0: UNIQUE WELL IDENTIFIER: A unique name, code or number designated as theprimary key for this row.
Column Comment.1: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.2: DEPTH OBSERVATION NUMBER: Unique identifier for the depth or interval.
Column Comment.3: MEDIA OBSERVATION NUMBER: unque identifier for the observation of the mediaweight.
Column Comment.4: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.5: EFFECTIVE DATE: The date that the data in this row first came into effect.
Column Comment.6: END DATE: the last date that this mud information was in effect.
Column Comment.7: EXPIRY DATE: The date that the data in this row was no longer active or in effect.
Column Comment.8: MUD DEPTH: Measured depth from the source to the point where the drilling mediaweight was recorded.
Column Comment.9: MUD DEPTH OUOM: Measured depth original unit of measure.
Column Comment.10: MUD WEIGHT: Value for the density of the drilling media used in the wellbore(massdivided by volume).
Column Comment.11: MUD WEIGHT OUOM: Drilling media weight original unit of measure.
Column Comment.12: MUD WEIGHT UNITS OF MEASURE: the reported data for mud weight is usuallyprovided as PPG (Pounds per gallon) or LB/CF.
Column Comment.13: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.14: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.15: REPORTED TRUE VERTICAL DEPTH: The reported depth of a well measuredvertically from the surface to the point of interest in the well bore. These reportedvalues may not represent the actual TVD as derivable from the directional survey andmay consequently be in error.
Column Comment.16: REPORTED TRUE VERTICAL DEPTH ORIGINAL UNITS OF MEASURE:
Column Comment.17: START DATE: the date when this particular mud information was first in effect.
Column Comment.18: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.19: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.20: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.21: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.22: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.23: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.24: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
